While I do try to participate by giving and receiving in lists like
this, I=
 feel that being such a newbie with Heritrix I would only be on
the receivi=
ng end and having nothing to give. That is why I decided to
find a consulta=
nt.

At this point my questions are very broad. I would like to archive lis=
ts
of websites and then scan them for viruses/spyware/malware stuff.
Anythi=
ng found would be added to a blacklist to be shared with various
security b=
ased newsgroups.

There is also certain javascript code segments I want to =
find and when I
do find them, I would like a list of those sites so I can i=
nvestigate
them further.

Is this possible with Heritrix? Is anyone doing t=
his now? 

I read about how the University of Washington did their research=
 but it
doesn't provide enough details on exactly how their system was
setu=
p/configured. I would like to do something like what they did/are
doing, bu=
t on an ongoing basis and actually provide lists to various
security groups=
 as well as using it myself.

Is this something the list can assist me with=
? Or should I keep looking
for consulting help?

Please let me know.

Thank=
 you in advance for your consideration.
